subject: Update documentation to reflect current codebase
body:
- Add 5 missing files to claude.md file structure:
  - ui/intercompany/party-selector.js (Party relationship selector)
  - ui/intercompany/options-overview.js (Options Overview grid)
  - ui/intercompany/comparison-manager.js (Compare Mode saved options)
  - ui/intercompany/comparison-view.js (Compare Mode side-by-side view)
  - utils/storage.js (localStorage persistence)
- Fix docs/ references: IMPLEMENTATION_ROADMAP.md → IMPLEMENTATION_PLAN.md
- Remove references to non-existent PHASE_0_PREPARATION.md
- Update module count: 16 modules → ~35 modules (~12,000 lines)
